projects.title: Solitaire
projects.description: Created a full-featured solitaire game in under 5 hours using Python and Pygame. Challenge accepted!
projects.details: Challenge: Created as a coding speed challenge. Features: Full solitaire gameplay with drag-and-drop. Learning: Rapid development, game state management.

projects.title: AirRace Game
projects.description: First semester CS project - a strategic card game with AI solver. Achieved 120% including full marks for the AI implementation.
projects.details: Grade: 120% including full marks for AI. Features: Strategic card game with intelligent AI opponent. Learning: Algorithm design, AI implementation, game theory.

projects.title: Pokemon Clone
projects.description: Built using vanilla JavaScript with open-world exploration and battle mechanics. Map created with Tiled.
projects.details: Features: Open-world exploration, battle mechanics, custom sprites. Tools: Tiled for map creation, Canvas API for rendering. Learning: Game loop, collision detection, state management.

projects.title: Web Development Portfolio
projects.description: Learned HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals while building this showcase of my skills and projects.
projects.details: Features: Responsive design, smooth animations, project gallery. Learning: Web standards, CSS layouts, DOM manipulation.

projects.title: Blackjack Game
projects.description: Classic card game implementation with betting system and dealer AI.
projects.details: Libraries: stdrandom, stddraw. Features: Betting system, dealer AI, card counting practice mode. Learning: Probability, game logic, user interface design.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: First JavaScript project using HTML canvas with classic snake gameplay.
projects.details: Features: Classic snake gameplay, score tracking, increasing difficulty. Learning: Canvas API, game timing, keyboard input handling.

projects.title: Eyes Tracker
projects.description: Interactive program with eyes following mouse cursor. First PyGame exploration.
projects.details: Features: Realistic eye movement, smooth animations. Learning: First PyGame exploration, trigonometry, vector math.

projects.title: Terminal Portfolio
projects.description: Modern portfolio with terminal interface and dual visual/terminal modes.
projects.details: This site! Features: Unix-like commands, dual visual/terminal modes, smooth animations. Learning: React hooks, state management, creative UI design.

projects.title: Binary Sort Algorithm
projects.description: Full binary sort implementation in 32-bit x86 Assembly (NASM) with C interface.
projects.details: Implementation: Wrote complete binary sort in x86 Assembly. Testing: Used C interface with GCC multilib for validation. Focus: Struct-based data handling and low-level optimization techniques.

projects.title: Multi-Room Chat Application
projects.description: Java chat app with multiple rooms, real-time calling, encryption, and built-in torrenting.
projects.details: Features: Multiple chat rooms, live message broadcasting, real-time voice calling, end-to-end encryption, integrated torrenting system for file sharing. Tech: JavaFX GUI, multithreading for concurrent users. Learning: Network programming, encryption, P2P protocols.

projects.title: Laser Tag Game
projects.description: Mobile laser tag game using computer vision for player detection and hit tracking.
projects.details: Features: Mobile-based gameplay, camera feed integration, real-time player detection, hit detection and tagging system. Tech: Computer vision algorithms, smartphone camera API. Learning: Mobile development, computer vision, real-time processing.

projects.title: Pose Detection React App
projects.description: Browser-based human pose detection app using TensorFlow.js with cross-browser compatibility.
projects.details: Features: Real-time human pose detection in browser, cross-platform compatibility. Challenges: Debugged Safari-specific compatibility issues. Tech: TensorFlow.js for ML, React for UI. Learning: Machine learning integration, browser APIs, performance optimization.

projects.title: PDF Automation Suite (CS344 - Praelexis)
projects.description: Suite of Python tools for automated PDF form detection, filling, and response placement.
projects.details: Company Project: Developed for Praelexis in CS344. Components: 1) Input Field Detection - Detects underlined/blank fields and prompts for input, auto-saves to /Filled/ directory. 2) PDF Response Writer - Precisely places typed responses with maintained text alignment, font, and spacing. 3) Form Field Locator - OpenCV-based visual detection of underlines and input zones with bounding box extraction. Learning: PDF manipulation, computer vision, automation workflows.
